{{user.name | uppercase}} Details

lastname: {{user.lastName}}
import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import {User} from '../user/modele/user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-detail', templateUrl: './user-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-detail.component.scss'] }) export class UserDetailComponent implements OnInit { @Input() user?: User; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
